name: She is in the Moon
description:
"She is in the Moon" is a narrative game about an old man with a duty: protect his house at all cost.

Harvest and repair your house during the day and kill the shadows coming at dawn. The only break you have is at night, when you can look up to the Moon and wonder how is she doing up there.

One day our main character, Jonah, will have to make a tough decision...
